description: This file defines the Driver entity class for the taxi booking backend system. It maps to the 'drivers' table in the database and includes fields like id, name, status, and vehicle, with annotations for persistence and validation.

classes.name: Driver
classes.description: Entity class representing a driver with fields for id, name, status, and vehicle, mapped to the database with JPA annotations.

methods.name: Driver
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for creating a Driver with specific properties.

methods.name: getVehicle
methods.description: Returns the vehicle associated with the driver.

methods.name: setVehicle
methods.description: Sets the vehicle associated with the driver.
